title: The Fear Principle
description: They were known as the Killing Times, when serial murder reached epidemic proportions...A woman named Jaguar tries to rehabilitate these killers by establishing a telepathic link with them and divulging their worst fears.But now she's about to face the most challenging subject of her career.The ultimate assassin. A dangerously disturbed woman who will teach Jaguar the true meaning of fear.
author: B.A. Chepaitis
